title: BUFFALO MOZZARELLA BRUSCHETTA
directions: Brush the slices of bread liberally with olive oil and grill or toast until crisp and lightly browned.
Combine the remaining ingredients in a bowl and let sit for about 5 minutes so the flavors meld.
Taste and adjust the seasoning, adding more salt or pepper if needed. Spoon the mixture over the toasted bread and serve.
ingredients: 8 large slices country-style Italian bread 2 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil 2 garlic cloves pressed and allowed to sit for 10 minutes 3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar Â¾ cup sliced fresh basil
12 ounces buffalo mozzarella torn into bite-size pieces Sea salt and freshly ground black pepper, to taste
